page.title: 14Killamarsh Activities
page.content: The Killamarsh Dynamos football team under 11's train on Wednesday they are 7th in the B division.The kit is blue socks blue shorts and a white T-shirt. There is a running club at the leisure centre in Killamarsh, you wear red or blue shorts and a white T-shirt.Claire Doxey goes to the girls brigade they have a uniform of a navy blazer white shirt and a blue skirt the ages go between 5-14.They go camping and play games.The Majorettes are always marching round Killamarsh. They wear red jackets red skirt white gloves and a black hat.Majorettes are on Thursday.There is a boys brigade too.At Killamarsh leisure centre you can play squash, tennis, badminton and games like that.There is always plenty to do in Killamarsh.
